    • Method Detail

      • getDither

        public static double getDither(int x,
               int y)
        Get the amount of dither for Bayer-Dithering a 2D coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate.
        y - The Y coordinate.
        Returns:
        The dither amount for this coordinate between 0.0 and 1.0.
